chapters.title: Chapter 40: A Hero in the Night
chapters.info: Aludra, p. 470 (376)—Woman who seeks shelter in the same barn that Mat and Thom were sleeping in in Aringill. She was cast out of the Illuminators' Guild because she was blamed for spoiling the performace for King Galldrian of Cairhien. The problem was actually Tammuz's fault (or so they thought), but she was a more convenient target. The mishap for Galldrian was actually caused by Rand al'Thor. See also Tammuz.
